<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>So it looks like the best performing parameters were 20 factors and a regularization value of 0.01. I would like to again look at the movie-to-movie similarity like my previous <a href="http://blog.ethanrosenthal.com/2015/11/02/intro-to-collaborative-filtering/">post</a>, but let's first explore the other minimization algorithm: stochastic gradient descent (SGD).</p>
<h2 id="Stochastic-Gradient-Descent">Stochastic Gradient Descent<a class="anchor-link" href="#Stochastic-Gradient-Descent">¶</a></h2><p>With SGD, we again take derivatives of the loss function, but we take the derivative with respect to each variable in the model. The "stochastic" aspect of the algorithm involves taking the derivative and updating feature weights one individual sample at a time. So, for each sample, we take the derivative of each variable, set them all equal to zero, solve for the feature weights, and update each feature. Somehow this method actually converges.</p>
<p>We will use a similar loss function to before, but I am going to add some more details to the model. Instead of assuming that a user <em>u</em>'s rating for item <em>i</em> can be described simply by the dot product of the user and item latent vectors, we will consider that each user and item can have a bias term associated with them. The rational is that certan users might tend to rate all movies highly, or certain movies may tend to always have low ratings. The way that I think about it is that the bias term takes care of the "DC" part of the signal which allows the latent factors to account for the more detailed variance in signal (kind of like the AC part). We will also include a global bias term as well. With all things combined, our predicted rating becomes</p>
<p>$$ \hat r_{ui} = \mu + b_{u} + b_{i} + \textbf{x}_{u}^{\intercal} \cdot{} \textbf{y}_{i} $$</p>
<p>where $\mu$ is the global bias, and $b_{u}$ ($b_{i}$) is the user (item) bias. Our loss function now becomes</p>
<p>$$L = \sum\limits_{u,i}(r_{ui} - (\mu + b_{u} + b_{i} + \textbf{x}_{u}^{\intercal} \cdot{} \textbf{y}_{i}))^{2} + 
\lambda_{xb} \sum\limits_{u} \left\Vert b_{u} \right\Vert^{2} + \lambda_{yb} \sum\limits_{i} \left\Vert b_{i} \right\Vert^{2} + \lambda_{xf} \sum\limits_{u} \left\Vert \textbf{x}_{u} \right\Vert^{2} + \lambda_{yf} \sum\limits_{u} \left\Vert \textbf{y}_{i} \right\Vert^{2}$$</p>
<p>where we have added on extra bias regularization terms. We want to update each feature (user and item latent factors and bias terms) with each sample. The update for the user bias is given by</p>
<p>$$ b_{u} \leftarrow b_{u} - \eta \frac{\partial L}{\partial b_{u}} $$</p>
<p>where $\eta$ is the <em>learning rate</em> which weights how much our update modifies the feature weights. The derivative term is given by</p>
<p>$$ \frac{\partial L}{\partial b_{u}} = 2(r_{ui} - (\mu + b_{u} + b_{i} + \textbf{x}_{u}^{\intercal} \cdot{} \textbf{y}_{i}))(-1) + 2\lambda_{xb} b_{u} $$
$$ \frac{\partial L}{\partial b_{u}} = 2(e_{ui})(-1) + 2\lambda_{xb} b_{u} $$
$$ \frac{\partial L}{\partial b_{u}} = - e_{ui} + \lambda_{xb} b_{u} $$</p>
<p>where $e_{ui}$ represents the error in our prediction, and we have dropped the factor of 2 (we can assume it gets rolled up in the learning rate). For all of our features, the updates end up being</p>
<p>$$ b_{u} \leftarrow b_{u} + \eta \, (e_{ui} - \lambda_{xb} b_{u}) $$
$$ b_{i} \leftarrow b_{i} + \eta \, (e_{ui} - \lambda_{yb} b_{i}) $$
$$ \textbf{x}_{u} \leftarrow \textbf{x}_{u} + \eta \, (e_{ui}\textbf{y}_{i} - \lambda_{xf} \textbf{x}_{u}) $$
$$ \textbf{y}_{i} \leftarrow \textbf{y}_{i} + \eta \, (e_{ui}\textbf{x}_{u} - \lambda_{yf} \textbf{y}_{i}) $$</p>
<h3 id="Computation">Computation<a class="anchor-link" href="#Computation">¶</a></h3><p>I've modified the original <code>ExplicitMF</code> class to allow for either <code>sgd</code> or <code>als</code> learning.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">class</span> <span class="nc">ExplicitMF</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="fm">__init__</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                 <span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">40</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">learning</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">item_fact_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.0</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                 <span class="n">user_fact_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.0</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">item_bias_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.0</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">user_bias_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.0</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">verbose</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">False</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">"""</span>
<span class="sd">        Train a matrix factorization model to predict empty </span>
<span class="sd">        entries in a matrix. The terminology assumes a </span>
<span class="sd">        ratings matrix which is ~ user x item</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        Params</span>
<span class="sd">        ======</span>
<span class="sd">        ratings : (ndarray)</span>
<span class="sd">            User x Item matrix with corresponding ratings</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        n_factors : (int)</span>
<span class="sd">            Number of latent factors to use in matrix </span>
<span class="sd">            factorization model</span>
<span class="sd">        learning : (str)</span>
<span class="sd">            Method of optimization. Options include </span>
<span class="sd">            'sgd' or 'als'.</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        item_fact_reg : (float)</span>
<span class="sd">            Regularization term for item latent factors</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        user_fact_reg : (float)</span>
<span class="sd">            Regularization term for user latent factors</span>
<span class="sd">            </span>
<span class="sd">        item_bias_reg : (float)</span>
<span class="sd">            Regularization term for item biases</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        user_bias_reg : (float)</span>
<span class="sd">            Regularization term for user biases</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        verbose : (bool)</span>
<span class="sd">            Whether or not to printout training progress</span>
<span class="sd">        """</span>
        
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ratings</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ratings</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_users</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_items</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ratings</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_factors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n_factors</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_fact_reg</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">item_fact_reg</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_fact_reg</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">user_fact_reg</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_bias_reg</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">item_bias_reg</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_bias_reg</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">user_bias_reg</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">learning</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sample_row</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sample_col</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ratings</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nonzero</span><span class="p">()</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_samples</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sample_row</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_v</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">verbose</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">als_step</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">latent_vectors</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">fixed_vecs</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="n">_lambda</span><span class="p">,</span>
                 <span class="nb">type</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'user'</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">"""</span>
<span class="sd">        One of the two ALS steps. Solve for the latent vectors</span>
<span class="sd">        specified by type.</span>
<span class="sd">        """</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'user'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="c1"># Precompute</span>
            <span class="n">YTY</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fixed_vecs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fixed_vecs</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">lambdaI</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">eye</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">YTY</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">_lambda</span>

            <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">u</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">xrange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">latent_vectors</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]):</span>
                <span class="n">latent_vectors</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">solve</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">YTY</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">lambdaI</span><span class="p">),</span> 
                                             <span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fixed_vecs</span><span class="p">))</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="nb">type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'item'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="c1"># Precompute</span>
            <span class="n">XTX</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fixed_vecs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fixed_vecs</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">lambdaI</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">eye</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">XTX</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">_lambda</span>
            
            <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">xrange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">latent_vectors</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]):</span>
                <span class="n">latent_vectors</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">solve</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">XTX</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">lambdaI</span><span class="p">),</span> 
                                             <span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">[:,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fixed_vecs</span><span class="p">))</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">latent_vectors</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">train</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">""" Train model for n_iter iterations from scratch."""</span>
        <span class="c1"># initialize latent vectors        </span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">normal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">1.</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                                          <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_users</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="p">))</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">normal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">1.</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                          <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_items</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="p">))</span>
        
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'als'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">partial_train</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning_rate</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_bias</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_users</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_bias</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_items</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">global_bias</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ratings</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)])</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">partial_train</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">partial_train</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">""" </span>
<span class="sd">        Train model for n_iter iterations. Can be </span>
<span class="sd">        called multiple times for further training.</span>
<span class="sd">        """</span>
        <span class="n">ctr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
        <span class="k">while</span> <span class="n">ctr</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">ctr</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_v</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'</span><span class="se">\t</span><span class="s1">current iteration: {}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ctr</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'als'</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">als_step</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                               <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                               <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                               <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_fact_reg</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                               <span class="nb">type</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'user'</span><span class="p">)</span>
                <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">als_step</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                               <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                               <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                               <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_fact_reg</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                               <span class="nb">type</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'item'</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">training_indices</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">n_samples</span><span class="p">)</span>
                <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shuffle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">training_indices</span><span class="p">)</span>
                <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sgd</span><span class="p">()</span>
            <span class="n">ctr</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">sgd</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">idx</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">training_indices</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">u</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sample_row</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sample_col</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">prediction</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">e</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">prediction</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># error</span>
            
            <span class="c1"># Update biases</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_bias</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning_rate</span> <span class="o">*</span> \
                                <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">e</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_bias_reg</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_bias</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">])</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_bias</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning_rate</span> <span class="o">*</span> \
                                <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">e</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_bias_reg</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_bias</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">])</span>
            
            <span class="c1">#Update latent factors</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning_rate</span> <span class="o">*</span> \
                                    <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">e</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span> <span class="o">-</span> \
                                     <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_fact_reg</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,:])</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning_rate</span> <span class="o">*</span> \
                                    <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">e</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span> <span class="o">-</span> \
                                     <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_fact_reg</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,:])</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">""" Single user and item prediction."""</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'als'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">return</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">prediction</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">global_bias</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_bias</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_bias</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">prediction</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">prediction</span>
    
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">predict_all</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">""" Predict ratings for every user and item."""</span>
        <span class="n">predictions</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> 
                                <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]))</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">u</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">xrange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_vecs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]):</span>
            <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">xrange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]):</span>
                <span class="n">predictions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">u</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
                
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">predictions</span>
    
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">calculate_learning_curve</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iter_array</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">"""</span>
<span class="sd">        Keep track of MSE as a function of training iterations.</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        Params</span>
<span class="sd">        ======</span>
<span class="sd">        iter_array : (list)</span>
<span class="sd">            List of numbers of iterations to train for each step of </span>
<span class="sd">            the learning curve. e.g. [1, 5, 10, 20]</span>
<span class="sd">        test : (2D ndarray)</span>
<span class="sd">            Testing dataset (assumed to be user x item).</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        The function creates two new class attributes:</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">        train_mse : (list)</span>
<span class="sd">            Training data MSE values for each value of iter_array</span>
<span class="sd">        test_mse : (list)</span>
<span class="sd">            Test data MSE values for each value of iter_array</span>
<span class="sd">        """</span>
        <span class="n">iter_array</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort</span><span class="p">()</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train_mse</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[]</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
        <span class="n">iter_diff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iter_array</span><span class="p">):</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_v</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Iteration: {}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_iter</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">iter_diff</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">partial_train</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_iter</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">iter_diff</span><span class="p">)</span>

            <span class="n">predictions</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_all</span><span class="p">()</span>

            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train_mse</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">get_mse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">predictions</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">)]</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">get_mse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">predictions</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">)]</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_v</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Train mse: '</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train_mse</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
                <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Test mse: '</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
            <span class="n">iter_diff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n_iter</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Similar to the ALS section above, let's try looking at the learning curve for 40 latent factors, no regularizaton, and a learning rate of 0.001.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">MF_SGD</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ExplicitMF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">40</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">verbose</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">iter_array</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">25</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">calculate_learning_curve</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iter_array</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.001</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Wow, quite a bit better than before! I assume that this is likely due to the inclusion of bias terms (especially because the ratings are not normalized).</p>
<h3 id="Evaluation-and-tuning">Evaluation and tuning<a class="anchor-link" href="#Evaluation-and-tuning">¶</a></h3><p>Let's try to optimize some hyperparameters. We'll start with a grid search of the learning rate.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [16]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">iter_array</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">25</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">learning_rates</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">1e-5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1e-4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1e-3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1e-2</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">best_params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'learning_rate'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">None</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_iter'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'train_mse'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inf</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'test_mse'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inf</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'model'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">None</span>


<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">rate</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">learning_rates</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Rate: {}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rate</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">MF_SGD</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ExplicitMF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">40</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">calculate_learning_curve</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iter_array</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">rate</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">min_idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">argmin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">min_idx</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'test_mse'</span><span class="p">]:</span>
        <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_iter'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">iter_array</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">min_idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'learning_rate'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rate</span>
        <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'train_mse'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train_mse</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">min_idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'test_mse'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">min_idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'model'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MF_SGD</span>
        <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'New optimal hyperparameters'</span>
        <span class="k">print</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Looks like a learning rate 0.001 was the best value. We'll now complete the hyperparameter optimization with a grid search through regularization terms and latent factors. This takes a while and could easily be parallelized, but that's beyond the scope of this post. Maybe next post I'll look into optimizing some of these algorithms.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [17]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">iter_array</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">25</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">latent_factors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">40</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">80</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">regularizations</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.001</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1.</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">regularizations</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">best_params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_factors'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">latent_factors</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'reg'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">regularizations</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_iter'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'train_mse'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inf</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'test_mse'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inf</span>
<span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'model'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">None</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">fact</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">latent_factors</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Factors: {}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fact</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">reg</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">regularizations</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Regularization: {}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">reg</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">MF_SGD</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ExplicitMF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">fact</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                            <span class="n">user_fact_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">reg</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">item_fact_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">reg</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                            <span class="n">user_bias_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">reg</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">item_bias_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">reg</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">calculate_learning_curve</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iter_array</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.001</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">min_idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">argmin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">min_idx</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'test_mse'</span><span class="p">]:</span>
            <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_factors'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fact</span>
            <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'reg'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">reg</span>
            <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_iter'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">iter_array</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">min_idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'train_mse'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train_mse</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">min_idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'test_mse'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MF_SGD</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">test_mse</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">min_idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'model'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MF_SGD</span>
            <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'New optimal hyperparameters'</span>
            <span class="k">print</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">

n_iter                                                    100
reg                                                     0.001

"
>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Best regularization: {}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'reg'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Best latent factors: {}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_factors'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Best iterations: {}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_params</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_iter'</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Best regularization: 0.01
Best latent factors: 80
Best iterations: 200
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>It should be noted that both our best latent factors and best iteration count were at the maximums of their respective grid searches. In hindsight, we should have set the grid search to a wider range. In practice, I am going to just go with these parameters. We could spend all day optimizing, but this is just a blog post on extensively studied data.</p>
<h2 id="Eye-tests">Eye tests<a class="anchor-link" href="#Eye-tests">¶</a></h2><p>To wrap up this post, let's again look at movie-to-movie similarity using by using <a href="http://www.themoviedb.org">themoviedb.org</a>'s API to grab the movie posters and visualize the top 5 most similar movies to an input movie. We'll use the cosine similarity of the item latent vectors to calculate the similarity. Let's go for gold and use the entire dataset to train the latent vectors and calculate similarity. We'll do this for both ALS and SGD models and compare the results.</p>
<p>We start by training both models with the best parameters we found.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [20]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">best_als_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ExplicitMF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'als'</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                            <span class="n">item_fact_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">user_fact_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">best_als_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [21]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">best_sgd_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ExplicitMF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ratings</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_factors</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">80</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'sgd'</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                            <span class="n">item_fact_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">user_fact_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                            <span class="n">user_bias_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">item_bias_reg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">best_sgd_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.001</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I'll use this small function to calculate both the ALS and the SGD movie-to-movie similarity matrices.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">cosine_similarity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">sim</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">item_vecs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">norms</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">array</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sqrt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sim</span><span class="p">))])</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">sim</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">norms</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">norms</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span>

<span class="n">als_sim</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cosine_similarity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_als_model</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">sgd_sim</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cosine_similarity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_sgd_model</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Lastly, just like before, let's read in the movie's IMDB urls and use those to query the themoviedb.org API.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [23]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Load in movie data</span>
<span class="n">idx_to_movie</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'u.item'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'r'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">line</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">readlines</span><span class="p">():</span>
        <span class="n">info</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">line</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'|'</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">idx_to_movie</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">info</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">info</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [24]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Build function to query themoviedb.org's API</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">json</span>

<span class="c1"># Get base url filepath structure. w185 corresponds to size of movie poster.</span>
<span class="n">api_key</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'INSERT API KEY HERE'</span>
<span class="n">headers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'Accept'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'application/json'</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">payload</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'api_key'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">}</span> 
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"http://api.themoviedb.org/3/configuration"</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                        <span class="n">params</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">payload</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                        <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">headers</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loads</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">base_url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">response</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'images'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'base_url'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'w185'</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">get_poster</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">imdb_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="c1"># Get IMDB movie ID</span>
    <span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">imdb_url</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">movie_id</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">url</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'/'</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># Query themoviedb.org API for movie poster path.</span>
    <span class="n">movie_url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'http://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/{:}/images'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">movie_id</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">headers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'Accept'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'application/json'</span><span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="n">payload</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'api_key'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">}</span> 
    <span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">movie_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">params</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">payload</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">headers</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">try</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">file_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loads</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="s1">'posters'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'file_path'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">except</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="c1"># IMDB movie ID is sometimes no good. Need to get correct one.</span>
        <span class="n">movie_title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">imdb_url</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'?'</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'('</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">payload</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'query'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">movie_title</span>
        <span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'http://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie'</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                                <span class="n">params</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">payload</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                                <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">headers</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">try</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">movie_id</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loads</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="s1">'results'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'id'</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">payload</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'query'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">None</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">movie_url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'http://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/{:}/images'</span>\
                        <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">movie_id</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">movie_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">params</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">payload</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">headers</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">file_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loads</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="s1">'posters'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'file_path'</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="k">except</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="c1"># Sometimes the url just doesn't work.</span>
            <span class="c1"># Return '' so that it does not mess up Image()</span>
            <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s1">''</span>
        
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">base_url</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">file_path</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>To visualize the posters in the Jupyter notebook's cells, we can use the IPython.display method. I've modified things slightly from last time so that the movie posters appear horizontally. Special thanks to <a href="http://stackoverflow.com/a/27795087">this</a> Stack Overflow answer for the idea to use straight HTML.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [25]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">IPython.display</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">HTML</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">IPython.display</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">display</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">display_top_k_movies</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">similarity</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mapper</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">movie_idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">movie_indices</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">argsort</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">similarity</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">movie_idx</span><span class="p">,:])[::</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">images</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">''</span>
    <span class="n">k_ctr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
    <span class="c1"># Start i at 1 to not grab the input movie</span>
    <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
    <span class="k">while</span> <span class="n">k_ctr</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">movie</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mapper</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">movie_indices</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span>
        <span class="n">poster</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">get_poster</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">movie</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">poster</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="s1">''</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">images</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="s2">"<img style='width: 120px; margin: 0px; </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="s2">                      float: left; border: 1px solid black;' src='</span><span class="si">%s</span><span class="s2">' />"</span>\
                      <span class="o">%</span> <span class="n">poster</span>
            <span class="n">k_ctr</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
        <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
    <span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">HTML</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">images</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">compare_recs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">als_similarity</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">sgd_similarity</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mapper</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                 <span class="n">movie_idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="c1"># Display input</span>
    <span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">HTML</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'<font size=5>'</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s1">'Input'</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s1">'</font>'</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">input_poster</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">get_poster</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mapper</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">movie_idx</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">input_image</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"<img style='width: 120px; margin: 0px; </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="s2">                      float: left; border: 1px solid black;' src='</span><span class="si">%s</span><span class="s2">' />"</span> \
                  <span class="o">%</span> <span class="n">input_poster</span>
    <span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">HTML</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">input_image</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="c1"># Display ALS Recs</span>
    <span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">HTML</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'<font size=5>'</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s1">'ALS Recs'</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s1">'</font>'</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">display_top_k_movies</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">als_similarity</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">idx_to_movie</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                         <span class="n">movie_idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="c1"># Display SGD Recs</span>
    <span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">HTML</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'<font size=5>'</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s1">'SGD Recs'</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s1">'</font>'</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">display_top_k_movies</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sgd_similarity</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">idx_to_movie</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                         <span class="n">movie_idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I'll let you look through 5 different movie-to-movie recommendations below.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [26]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="c1"># Toy Story</span>
<span class="n">compare_recs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">als_sim</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">sgd_sim</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">idx_to_movie</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<span class="n">compare_recs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">als_sim</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">sgd_sim</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">idx_to_movie</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">base_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">api_key</span><span class="p">)</span>
